articles.title: Incredible Milestone: NASA's Webb Telescope Successfully Completes Deployment in Space - SciTechDaily
articles.description: NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope team fully deployed its 21-foot, gold-coated primary mirror, successfully completing the final stage of all major spacecraft deployments to prepare for science operations. A joint effort with the European Space Agency (ESA) a…
articles.content:
ByNASAJanuary 9, 2022
NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope. Credit: NASA Goddard Space Flight Center and Northrup Grumman

articles.title: O2 rules out return of European roaming charges despite Brexit - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Virgin Media O2 is poised to become the only network not to bring back the charges in a move that will pile pressure onto its rivals
articles.content:
Virgin Media O2 has refused to bring back European roaming charges post-Brexit in a move that will heap pressure on its rivals to scrap their fees.
